sub_concepts.name: Genes
sub_concepts.definition: Segments of DNA that contain the instructions for building proteins.

sub_concepts.name: Nucleotides
sub_concepts.definition: The building blocks of DNA, consisting of a sugar, a phosphate group, and a nitrogenous base.

sub_concepts.name: Chromosomes
sub_concepts.definition: Structures composed of DNA wrapped around proteins found in the nucleus of eukaryotic cells.

sub_concepts.name: Double Helix
sub_concepts.definition: The twisted-ladder structure of DNA, consisting of two strands of nucleotides held together by hydrogen bonds.
